data:
Sure, I can help you with that! Here are four stakeholder groups for PREVENT-IA, along with tables of stakeholder involvement:

1. Core Team
* Responsible for the development, maintenance, and improvement of PREVENT-IA.
* Frequent involvement in all aspects of the product, from architecture and design to risk management and business goals.

| Stakeholder | Role | Involvement |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Product Manager | Defines product vision, objectives, and roadmap | Frequent involvement in all aspects of the product |
| Developers | Designs and implements product features | Frequent involvement in architecture, coding, and testing |
| UX Designer | Designs user interfaces and user experience | Frequent involvement in UI/UX design and testing |
| Data Scientist | Develops AI models and algorithms | Frequent involvement in data analysis, modeling, and evaluation |
| DevOps Engineer | Ensures product reliability, scalability, and security | Frequent involvement in infrastructure, deployment, and monitoring |
| Technical Writer | Creates product documentation and guides | Frequent involvement in content creation and maintenance |
| Compliance Officer | Ensures product compliance with regulations and standards | Frequent involvement in risk management and legal issues |

2. Frequent Involvement Stakeholders
* Involved in the daily operation and use of PREVENT-IA.
* Frequent involvement in training, feedback, and support.

| Stakeholder | Role | Involvement |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Trainers | Delivers ORP training to workers | Frequent involvement in content delivery, assessment, and feedback |
| HR Managers | Manages workforce training and development | Frequent involvement in training tracking, scheduling, and reporting |
| IT Support | Provides technical support and assistance | Frequent involvement in troubleshooting, maintenance, and user support |
| Workers | Learns ORP skills and best practices | Frequent involvement in learning, practice, and assessment |

3. Occasional Involvement Stakeholders
* Involved in the strategic direction and evaluation of PREVENT-IA.
* Occasional involvement in product decisions, feedback, and communication.

| Stakeholder | Role | Involvement |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Executive Sponsors | Provides strategic direction and resources | Occasional involvement in product vision, goals, and metrics |
| Business Analysts | Analyzes market trends and user needs | Occasional involvement in user research, feedback, and insights |
| Sales and Marketing | Promotes PREVENT-IA to potential customers | Occasional involvement in product positioning, messaging, and outreach |
| External Consultants | Provides expertise in ORP and AI | Occasional involvement in product design, evaluation, and improvement |

4. Seldom Involvement Stakeholders
* Affected by the outcomes and impact of PREVENT-IA.
* Seldom involvement in product awareness, adoption, and advocacy.

| Stakeholder | Role | Involvement |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Regulators | Sets and enforces ORP regulations and standards | Seldom involvement in product compliance, reporting, and audits |
| Industry Associations | Promotes best practices and standards in ORP | Seldom involvement in product partnerships, events, and advocacy |
| Competitors | Offers similar or alternative training solutions | Seldom involvement in product differentiation, benchmarking, and comparison |
| General Public | Advocates for worker safety and well-being | Seldom involvement in product awareness, adoption, and feedback |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.
